scripts.test:debug: cucumber-js src/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/*.ts  --require src/hooks/**/*.ts --world-parameters '{"debug": true}'
scripts.cucumber: cucumber-js src/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/*.ts  --require src/hooks/**/*.ts -f json:./reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
scripts.precucumber: rimraf downloads reports && mkdir reports && mkdir downloads
